controlstream@id.description: Local ID of the control stream that the command is part of. This can be omitted when posting the command to a specific control stream URL.

samplingFeature@id.description: Local ID of the sampling feature that is the target of the command

procedure@link.description: Link to the procedure/method used to process the command

issueTime.description: Time at which the command was issued. If omitted on creation, the server sets it to the time the request was received.

executionTime.description: Time period during which the command was executed

sender.description: Identifier of the person or entity who submitted the command

parameters.description: Command parameters. Must be valid according to the schema provided in the control stream metadata
